subSubSection.paragraph:
Euryphymus sinuosus : Martínez y Fernández-Castillo, 1898:35
; Martínez y Fernández-Castillo, 1902:274.

Plegmapterus sinuosus Dirsh, 1956:121–272
, figs. 36. 1, 2; Dirsh, 1965:278 ; Johnston, 1968:203 .

Type locality.
Africa, Southern Africa , Namaqualand (= Namibia ). No type examined
.
